questionText: The first question has to do with how are you "ENERGISED".

text: Meet people readily and participate in many activities.
Hates to do nothing on the go.
Likes working or talking in groups.
Likes to be center of attention.
Proceed cautiously in meeting people & participate in selected activities.
Would prefer to socialize in small groups or just do the job by myself.

questionText: This question is to find how you GATHER information or what you pay ATTENTION to.

text: Learn new thing by imitation and observation.
Value solid, recognizable methods achieved in a step-by-step manner.
Tend to be specific and literal, give detailed descriptions
Learn new things through general concepts.
Value different or unusual methods achieved via inspiration.
Tend to be general and figurative, use metaphors and analogies.
Use new and different ways to solve problems and teach solutions.
Leap around in a roundabout way.

questionText: This category identifies how you make DECISIONS and reach conclusions.

text: Question other's findings, because they might be wrong.
Deal with people firmly, as needed.
Expect the world to run on logical principles.
Notice pros & cons of each option.
Feeling valid if they are logical.
Tolerate occasional queries as to my emotional state in relationships.
Agree more with others' findings, because people are worth listening to.
Expect the world to recognize individual differences.
Note how an option has value and it affects people.
Like to please others; show appreciation.
Appreciate frequent queries as to my emotional state.

questionText: Last One...This one has to do with the LIFESTYLE you adopt.

text: Prefer my life to be decisive, imposing my will on it.
Prefer knowing what they are getting themselves into.
Work for a settled life with my plans in order.
See time as a finite resource and take deadlines seriously.
Seek to adapt my life and experience to what comes along.
Keep my life as flexible as possible so that nothing's missed.
Enjoy surprises and like adapting to last-minute changes.
See time as a renewable resource and see deadlines as elastic.
Ignore "to-do" list even if made one.
Would rather do whatever comes along.
